Most jobs, you're discouraged from being emotional. As an actor, like 'if you can cry, that's great!' @MissJuliaStiles @SAGFoundation
It's gotten harder. The 1st season I was like 'yes, I'll get in bed with an old man in a diaper!' @MissJuliaStiles on Blue escort scenes.
It's also a format for things you don't normally [get] to do. We explore the space between lines. @MissJuliaStiles on WIGS @SAGFoundation
You're forced to justify the moments. #JonAvnet on writing for the web
